Text: Very poor. Although video & sound quality is quite good. Each file has multiple gaps in play. No files play more than a couple of minutes without losing video & sound for up to a minute. I ended up having to find an alternate source & downloading the whole lot again. But thanks for your efforts though, they are still appreciated.

PS. I tried many players including, VLC, Media Player Classic, Win Media Player & the Divx Player. I also played each file on 3 separate machines too. I also tried to repair the files with VirtualDubMod but no joy there either.
